body:
Hello guys! My name is Abusive and I decided to make this post to announce that every friday I will making a stream at night with the supreme leader Posighdun (I was not bribed to say this) and sometimes I will stream with friends like Junr or Cammy.
So if you are interested on coming to have some fun you are welcome.

I will be streamings at 8:00 PM for me (Mexico City -UTC 6:00)
Here's the link for the streams:

  • twitch.tv/abusiveuser
  • twitch.tv/abusiveuser
I hope guy I can you see there! Have fun <3

STATUS: OFF

title: Abusive's Weekly Summer Streams!
